eap.message:
Are you sure? You are about to stop the trigger warning in {{ placeCodeName }}.

In case of a new event, the area will be triggered again by the IBF-Portal. But within the current event - even if predictions worsen - the trigger for this area will remain stopped. {{disasterSpecificText}}

no-eap.message:
Are you sure? You are about to stop the alert in {{ placeCodeName }}.

In case of a new event, a new alert for the area will be given by the IBF-Portal. But within the current event - even if predictions worsen - the alert for this area will remain stopped. {{disasterSpecificText}}
